Press & Media: Amplify Your Brand
with First-Class PR Support

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

At Epic Unicorn Ventures, we understand the power of media and public relations in
driving a startup’s growth. That’s why we offer our portfolio companies first-class PR
services to ensure that your brand’s story reaches the right audiences, at the right
time. Whether you’re launching a new product, securing funding, or hitting major
milestones, we are here to get you the media attention you deserve.

” content_phone=”

services to ensure that your brand’s story reaches the right audiences, at the right
time. Whether you’re launching a new product, securing funding, or hitting major
milestones, we are here to get you the media attention you deserve.

At Epic Unicorn Ventures, we understand the power of media and public relations in
driving a startup’s growth. That’s why we offer our portfolio companies first-class PR
services to ensure that your brand’s story reaches the right audiences, at the right
time. Whether you’re launching a new product, securing funding, or hitting major
milestones, we are here to get you the media attention you deserve.

Leverage Our Extensive PR Network

” content_phone=”

Leverage Our Extensive PR Network

” content_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”satoshi|–et_global_body_font_weight|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.92)” text_font_size=”61px” text_line_height=”65px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||45px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0px||16px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||15px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”|0px||0px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|8px||8px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|0px||0px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_scaling=”0|57|57|100|20%|100|100″ text_font_size_tablet=”36px” text_font_size_phone=”28px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”50px” text_line_height_phone=”38px” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Leverage Our Extensive PR Network

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

With years of experience and an unmatched track record, we’ve been featured in over 250 leading publications worldwide. From Forbes to Business Insider, Süddeutsche Zeitung, and countless others, we have the relationships and the know how to secure top tier media placements for our portfolio companies. Our founder, Christopher Obereder, has been listed on the Forbes 30 Under 30 list twice and has been featured in nearly every major media outlet. His extensive personal network is a valuable asset to any startup looking to make a media splash.

” content_phone=”

With years of experience and an unmatched track record, we’ve been featured in over 250 leading publications worldwide. From Forbes to Business Insider, Süddeutsche Zeitung, and countless others, we have the relationships and the know how to secure top tier media placements for our portfolio companies. Our founder, Christopher Obereder, has been listed on the Forbes 30 Under 30 list twice and has been featured in nearly every major media outlet. His extensive personal network is a valuable asset to any startup looking to make a media splash.

” content_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”satoshi||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.81)” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”34px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||40px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||25px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||25px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”|40px||40px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|8px||8px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|8px||8px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_scaling=”0|44|44|100|20%|100%|100″ text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”32px” text_line_height_phone=”29px” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

With years of experience and an unmatched track record, we’ve been featured in over 250 leading publications worldwide. From Forbes to Business Insider, Süddeutsche Zeitung, and countless others, we have the relationships and the know how to secure top tier media placements for our portfolio companies. Our founder, Christopher Obereder, has been listed on the Forbes 30 Under 30 list twice and has been featured in nearly every major media outlet. His extensive personal network is a valuable asset to any startup looking to make a media splash.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

When you partner with us, you gain access to a global network of journalists,editors, and media influencers who can provide instant credibility and exposure to your business. Whether you need press coverage in tech, business, lifestyle, or industry specific publications, we have the connections to make it happen.

” content_phone=”

When you partner with us, you gain access to a global network of journalists,editors, and media influencers who can provide instant credibility and exposure to
your business. Whether you need press coverage in tech, business, lifestyle, or
industry specific publications, we have the connections to make it happen.

Custom PR strategy : Tailored media plans designed to fit your business objectives and product launches.

Guaranteed coverage : Get your startup featured in relevant top tier outlets.

End-to-end PR support : From crafting press releases to organizing media interviews and managing relationships with key journalists.

Targeted industry outreach : Whether you’re in tech, fintech, health, or entertainment, we ensure your news reaches the right media verticals.” content_phone=”

Unlocking the Power of Global Media

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

We don’t just aim for one time coverage; our goal is to help you build lasting media relationships and sustained
exposure over time. As your company grows, we’ll ensure your milestones are covered across multiple platforms, creating a constant media presence that enhances your brand’s reputation and boosts trust with potential investors, customers, and partners. By leveraging our years of PR expertise, we help you:

” content_phone=”

We don’t just aim for one time coverage; our goal is to help you build lasting media relationships and sustained
exposure over time. As your company grows, we’ll ensure your milestones are covered across multiple platforms, creating a constant media presence that enhances your brand’s reputation and boosts trust with potential investors, customers, and partners. By leveraging our years of PR expertise, we help you:

We don’t just aim for one time coverage; our goal is to help you build lasting media relationships and sustained
exposure over time. As your company grows, we’ll ensure your milestones are covered across multiple platforms, creating a constant media presence that enhances your brand’s reputation and boosts trust with potential investors, customers, and partners. By leveraging our years of PR expertise, we help you:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

  • Boost brand visibility : Increase awareness and credibility with media coverage in toptier outlets.

  • Enhance your market positioning : Build authority and trust in your industry through consistent, positive media coverage.

  • Generate excitement : Create buzz around new product launches or major announcements that drive customer engagement and sales.

” content_phone=”

  • Boost brand visibility : Increase awareness and credibility with media coverage in toptier outlets.

  • Enhance your market positioning : Build authority and trust in your industry through consistent, positive media coverage.

  • Generate excitement : Create buzz around new product launches or major announcements that drive customer engagement and sales.

Proven PR Success

Proven PR Success

Proven PR Success

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

Our portfolio companies have benefited from extensive press coverage that helped accelerate their growth. By working with Epic Unicorn Ventures, you’ll join a group of startups that have appeared in high profile publications, featured in interviews on major news platforms, and received exclusive attention in both traditional media and online outlets.

” content_phone=”

Our portfolio companies have benefited from extensive press coverage that helped accelerate their growth. By working with Epic Unicorn Ventures, you’ll join a group of startups that have appeared in high profile publications, featured in interviews on major news platforms, and received exclusive attention in both traditional media and online outlets.

Our portfolio companies have benefited from extensive press coverage that helped accelerate their growth. By working with Epic Unicorn Ventures, you’ll join a group of startups that have appeared in high profile publications, featured in interviews on major news platforms, and received exclusive attention in both traditional media and online outlets.
